text: X Factor is a Danish television music competition to find new singing talent. The second season premiered on January 2, 2009 and ended on March 27 on DR1. Lise Rønne returned as host, while Thomas Blachman, Lina Rafn and Remee returned as judges. ==Judges and hosts== In March 2008, Thomas Blachman announced that he would not be returning as a judge for season 2. On September 18, 2008, Ekstra Bladet revealed that Lina Rafn would be returning as a judge for season 2.http://ekstrabladet.dk/flash/filmogtv/tv/article4316249.ece The following day, it was officially confirmed that Blachman, Rafn and Remee would all be returning as judges for season 2.http://ekstrabladet.dk/flash/filmogtv/tv/article4311076.ece Lise Rønne returned as host. ==Selection process== ===Auditions=== Auditions took place in Copenhagen and Århus in 2008. ===Superbootcamp=== Remee was given the Groups category, Rafn was given the Over 25s and Blachman was given the 15-24s. ===Bootcamp=== For the first time in the show's history, the judges had an assistant to help them decide which acts to send through to the live shows. Remee was assisted by Martin Dodd, but Rafn and Blachman were not assisted. The 6 eliminated acts were: *15-24s: Patricia (put into Alien Beat Club), Patrick *Over 25s: Janus, Lotus *Groups: Anders & Elisabeth, Soul Connect ==Finalists== : – Winner : – Runner-up : – Third place {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col" style="width:160px;"|Categories (mentor) ! scope="col" colspan="4" style="width:500px;"|Acts |- ! scope="row"| 15-24s (Blachman) | style="background:#D1E5F8;"| Mohamed Ali || Lucas Francis Claver || Sidsel Lieknins Vestertjele |- ! scope="row"| Over 25s (Rafn) | bgcolor="#B4FB84"| Linda Andrews|| Seest Christensen || Claus Lillelund |- ! scope="row"| Groups (Remee) | style="background:pink"| Alien Beat Club || Asian Sensation || Tårnhøj |} ==Live shows== The live shows began on February 13, 2009 and ended on March 27, 2009 at DR Byen.
